allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit: Food management app with Supabase backend

Features:
- User authentication \(signup/login\)
- Group management for household sharing
- Food item CRUD with real-time updates
- Expiry date tracking with color-coded status
- Storage location filtering \(refrigerator, freezer, pantry, other\)
- Category filtering

Tech stack:
- Vite + React + TypeScript
- Supabase for auth and database
- React Hook Form for form handling
- date-fns for date manipulation

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
